SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_mcxs where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs='主线' and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq1} and zhz = #{zhz1} and lf = '左幅' and wz='主线') sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh,mcxs.val
